about_the_game:
This DLC contains:

- A hand-drawn map by Hauke Vagt, as a file to print yourself a poster with and as a 16:9 file to use as a wallpaper.
- The cover art of the game, as a file to print yourself a poster with and as a 16:9 file to use as a wallpaper.
- 3D files to print a figure of Master Key's protagonist.

Warning: this DLC does not contain any in-game content for Master Key and is not required to enjoy the game.
detailed_description:
This DLC contains:

- A hand-drawn map by Hauke Vagt, as a file to print yourself a poster with and as a 16:9 file to use as a wallpaper.
- The cover art of the game, as a file to print yourself a poster with and as a 16:9 file to use as a wallpaper.
- 3D files to print a figure of Master Key's protagonist.

Warning: this DLC does not contain any in-game content for Master Key and is not required to enjoy the game.
name: Master Key - Bonus content
short_description: This DLC contains bonus content relative to Master Key: 2 posters/wallpapers and 3D file.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Czech, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
